name: Spasla
body:
### Welcome to Spasla.
Spasla is the leading designer and manufacturer of ionic propulsion systems. Spasla was founded in 2016 in the back of a van, with our minds and our morals. Here at Spasla we believe everyone deserves interstellar travel at a low cost, and now that is possible with the power of Spasla!!!  

### Ground Breaking Technology
Spasla engineers and programmers have designed and invented cutting edge ionic propulsion technology that is opening up new frontiers. Our brand new models include the [SJAS-210](https://theth1rd.github.io/Spasla/SJAS-210.html) and the SJAS-200a. 

### Are You Spasla Materiel?
Try your hand at the new Spasla readiness test!
[Accept the Chalenge](https://theth1rd.github.io/Spasla/game.html)

[Check us out on twitter](https://theth1rd.github.io/Spasla/tweets.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
